item.description:
Rushad Eggleston (Tornado Rider, Crooked Still, The Wild Band Of Snee, The Butt Wizards, Fiddlers 4, Darol Anger's Republic Of Strings, Wayfaring Strangers), a.k.a "The Sneth Goblin", "proprietor of igwarfnees","'slarkman boutchwees von hijj-catcher" has been described as "magic elf", "Monterey County's first supernatural rock star", "in the vanguard of the younger generation of virtuosic cellists", "a master of improvisation and fiddle styles" ...in short, a genius.

I call him the "eye of the tornado."

Maeve Gilchrist and Mike Barnett open!
http://maevegilchristmusic.com/
http://www.mikebarnettfiddle.com/
Who knows who else will show up to join in?

ALL AGES
$10 cash at the door
Doors 7:30pm
Maveve and Mike 8:00-8:30
The Prince of Jick 8:45-?

The Burren
247 Elm Street, Davis Square
Somerville, MA 02144
Phone: (617) 776-6896

More info and videos at http://lordgeoffreypresents.blogspot.com/
item.name: RUSHAD EGGLESTON and friends w/ Maeve Gilchrist and Mike Barnett in Somerville
